00045 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlTimestamp::
00046 addTimestamp( const char * tag, TiXmlNode* child){
00047 
00048   TiXmlElement ts("Timestamp");
00049   ts.SetAttribute("tag", tag);
00050 
00051   time_t now=time (NULL);
00052 
00053   ostringstream o;
00054   o<<now;
00055 
00056   TiXmlText nText( o.str().c_str());
00057   ts.InsertEndChild( nText );
00058 
00059   child->InsertEndChild( ts );
00060 
00061   child->Print( stdout, 0 );
00062 }
00063 
00079 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlTimestamp::
00080 getCTime( const char *tag, TiXmlElement* child){
00081 
00082   return getCTimeS(tag, child).c_str();
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00096 std::string RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlTimestamp::
00097 getCTimeS( const char *tag, TiXmlElement* child ){
00098 
00099   bool foundedTimestamp=false;
00100 
00101   TiXmlHandle docHandle( child );
00102   TiXmlElement* times = docHandle.FirstChild( "Timestamp" ).Element();
00103     
00104   for( times; times; times=times->NextSiblingElement() ){
00105 
00106     const char* childTag=times->Attribute("tag");
00107 
00108     // If child is NULL, no attribute was found
00109     if (childTag){
00110       if (strcmp(childTag, tag)==0){
00111         foundedTimestamp=true;
00112         
00113 
00114         TiXmlNode* timesNode=times->FirstChild();
00115         if (timesNode){
00116           TiXmlText* textNode=times->FirstChild()->ToText();
00117           if (textNode){
00118             time_t val;
00119             string strTimeStamp=textNode->Value();
00120             istringstream iss;
00121             iss.str( strTimeStamp );
00122             iss >> val;
00123           
00124             ostringstream o;
00125             o<<ctime(&val);
00126             // I must remove the newline and line feed characters
00127             string ret=o.str().substr( 0, 24 );;
00128             
00129             return ret;
00130           }
00131         }
00132       }
00133     } // !childtag
00134   }
00135 
00136 
00137   if (!foundedTimestamp)
00138     return "";
00139 }
00140 
00150 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlTimestamp::
00151 delTimestamp( const char* tag, TiXmlNode* child){
00152 
00153   TiXmlHandle docHandle( child );
00154   TiXmlElement* times = docHandle.FirstChild( "Timestamp" ).Element();
00155     
00156   for( times; times; times=times->NextSiblingElement() ){
00157 
00158     const char* childTag=times->Attribute("tag");
00159 
00160     // If child is NULL, no attribute was found
00161     if (childTag){
00162       if (strcmp(childTag, tag)==0){
00163         child->RemoveChild(times );
00164         
00165       }
00166     }
00167   } // !childtag
00168 }
